title: cmd/go: go test -i doesn't work if there are no Go files in the current directory.
body:
% go test ./...
warning: building out-of-date packages:
	launchpad.net/gocheck
	launchpad.net/goamz/ec2/ec2test
	launchpad.net/goamz/s3/s3test
	labix.org/v2/mgo
	launchpad.net/lpad
installing these packages with 'go test -i ./...' will speed future tests.

[...]
% go test -i ./...
can't load package: package launchpad.net/juju-core: no Go source files in
/home/rog/src/go/src/launchpad.net/juju-core
%
